locations.name: Dallas Museum of Art
locations.cost: Free general admission; paid tickets for special exhibitions
locations.description: Located in the vibrant Arts District, the DMA features a diverse collection of global art—from classic to contemporary.

locations.name: Dallas Zoo
locations.address: 650 South R.L. Thornton Freeway, Dallas, TX 75203
locations.cost: Regular admission $15; kids under 2 free; parking $12
locations.description: Texas's largest zoo with over 2,000 animals across 106 acres and seasonal promotional days.

locations.name: Reunion Tower
locations.description: Iconic observation tower offering panoramic city views from 470 feet, especially great at night.

locations.name: Dallas Arboretum & Botanical Garden
locations.description: Stunning gardens along White Rock Lake with seasonal festivals, flower shows, and outdoor concerts.

locations.name: The Sixth Floor Museum at Dealey Plaza
locations.description: Museum chronicling JFK's assassination and legacy in the historic Texas School Book Depository.

locations.name: Bishop Arts District
locations.cost: Free to explore; pay per shop/venue
locations.description: Eclectic neighborhood with indie shops, art galleries, cafés, and nightlife—great for strolling.

locations.name: White Rock Lake Activities
locations.address: White Rock Lake Park, Dallas, TX
locations.description: Scenic outdoor destination for kayaking, paddleboarding, walking, and cycling around the lake.

locations.name: Pioneer Plaza & Cattle Drive Sculptures
locations.description: Iconic public art installation featuring a bronze cattle drive—perfect for photos and local history.
